name: Application

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The object's container.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: colorSettings
properties.description: The name of the selected color setting's set.

properties.name: activeDocument
properties.description: The frontmost document.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The application name.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The full path of the location of the Adobe Photoshop application.

properties.name: preferences
properties.description: The application preference settings (equivalent to selecting Edit > Preferences in the Adobe Photoshop application in Windows or Photoshop > Preferences in Mac OS).

properties.name: scriptingVersion
properties.description: The version of the Scripting interface.

properties.name: freeMemory
properties.description: The amount of unused memory available to Photoshop.

properties.name: version
properties.description: The version of Adobe Photoshop application that you are running.

properties.name: displayDialogs
properties.description: The dialog mode for the document, which indicates whether or not Photoshop displays dialogs when the script runs.

properties.name: foregroundColor
properties.description: The default foreground color (used to paint, fill, and stroke selections).

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The default background color (used to paint, fill, and stroke selections).

properties.name: playbackParameters
properties.description: The playback options, which indicate the speed at which Photoshop plays actions.

properties.name: playbackDisplayDialogs
properties.description: The dialog mode for playback mode, which indicates whether or not Photoshop displays dialogs in playback mode.

properties.name: notifiersEnabled
properties.description: If true, notifiers are enabled.

properties.name: windowsFileTypes
properties.description: A list of the image file extensions Photoshop can open.

properties.name: macintoshFileTypes
properties.description: A list of the image file types Photoshop can open.

properties.name: preferencesFolder
properties.description: The full path to the preferences folder.

properties.name: locale
properties.description: The language locale of the application.

properties.name: documents
properties.description: The collection of open documents.

properties.name: fonts
properties.description: The fonts installed on this system.

properties.name: notifiers
properties.description: The notifiers currently configured (in the Scripts Events Manager menu in the application).

properties.name: scriptingBuildDate
properties.description: The build date of the scripting interface.

properties.name: recentFiles
properties.description: Files in the Recent Files list.

properties.name: build
properties.description: The build number of Adobe Photoshop application.

properties.name: systemInformation
properties.description: System information of the host application and machine.

properties.name: measurementLog
properties.description: The log of measurements taken.

methods.name: togglePalettes
methods.description: Toggle palette visibility.

methods.name: doAction
methods.description: Plays the specified action from the Actions palette.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The name of the action to play. (Note that the action name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The name of the action set containing the action being played. (Note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a support document.

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: The document to load.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens the specified document file(s).

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: The document(s) to opend.

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: The document type (The default is to let Photoshop deduce the format).
Creates a smart object around the document.
parameters.name: asSmartObject

methods.name: purge
methods.description: Purges one or more caches.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The caches to purge.

methods.name: makePhotoGallery
methods.description: DEPRECATED. Creates a web photo gallery.

parameters.name: inputFolder
parameters.description: Folder to process or an array of files to process.

parameters.name: outputFolder
parameters.description: Location for output files.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the web photo gallery.

methods.name: makePDFPresentation
methods.description: Creates a PDF presentation file.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.description: The input files to include in the presentation.

parameters.name: outputFile
parameters.description: The location of the output file.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the PDF presentation.

methods.name: makePhotomerge
methods.description: DEPRECATED. Merges multiple files into one, user interaction required.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.description: List of input files to include.

methods.name: makeContactSheet
methods.description: Creates a contact sheet from multiple files.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.description: The files to include.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for creating the contact sheet.

methods.name: makePicturePackage
methods.description: Creates a picture package from multiple files.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.description: The files to include.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for creating a Picture Package.

methods.name: batch
methods.description: Runs the batch automation routine; analogous to using the Batch command in Photoshop.

parameters.name: inputFiles
parameters.description: The files to operate on.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The name of the action to play (note that the Action name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The name of the action set containing the action being played (note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for batch automation.

methods.name: bringToFront
methods.description: Makes Photoshop the active application.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Pauses the script until the application refreshes.

methods.name: refreshFonts
methods.description: Force the font list to get refreshed.

methods.name: putCustomOptions
methods.description: Save user objects in the Photoshop registry.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique string ID for the user object.

parameters.name: customObject
parameters.description: The user-defined custom object to save in the registry.
If true, the object persists after the script has finished.
parameters.name: persistent

methods.name: getCustomOptions
methods.description: Retrieves user objects from the Photoshop registry for the ID with value key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique string ID for the user object.

methods.name: eraseCustomOptions
methods.description: Removes the specified user objects from the Photoshop registry.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The unique string ID for user object(s) to remove.

methods.name: featureEnabled
methods.description: If true, the specified feature is enabled.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the feature.

methods.name: openDialog
methods.description: Uses the Photoshop open dialog to select files.

methods.name: runMenuItem
methods.description: Run a menu item.

parameters.name: menuID
parameters.description: Id of menu to run.

methods.name: system
methods.description: Perform a system call.

parameters.name: callString
parameters.description: System call string.

methods.name: executeAction
methods.description: Plays an ActionManager event.

parameters.name: eventID
parameters.description: The event to play.

parameters.name: descriptor
parameters.description: The action descriptor to play.

parameters.name: displayDialogs
parameters.description: The display permissions for dialogs and alert messages.

methods.name: executeActionGet
methods.description: Obtains an action descriptor.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The reference specification of the property.

methods.name: stringIDToTypeID
methods.description: Converts from a string ID to a runtime ID.

parameters.name: stringID
parameters.description: The ID to convert.

methods.name: typeIDToStringID
methods.description: Converts from a runtime ID to a string ID.

parameters.name: typeID
parameters.description: The ID to convert.

methods.name: charIDToTypeID
methods.description: Converts from a four character code to a runtime ID.

parameters.name: charID
parameters.description: The ID to convert.

methods.name: typeIDToCharID
methods.description: Converts from a runtime ID to a character ID.

parameters.name: typeID
parameters.description: The ID to convert.

methods.name: beep
methods.description: Alerts the user.

methods.name: isQuicktimeAvailable
methods.description: Returns true if Quicktime is installed.

methods.name: showColorPicker
methods.description: Display color picker dialog. Returns false if dialog is cancelled, true otherwise.

parameters.description: If true the foreground color is chosen, if false the background color is chosen.
parameters.name: pickForeground

methods.name: reflectCSAW
methods.description: Generate Creative Suite ActionScript Wrappers in specified directory.

parameters.name: outputFolder
parameters.description: Location for the output files.

description: The Adobe Photoshop application object, which contains all other Adobe Photoshop objects.
